meanings.definition: The outline of buildings or mountains against the sky.
meanings.sent1: The skyline of the city was filled with tall buildings.
meanings.sent2: I love watching the skyline at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The skyline looked like a row of giant toys against the sky.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the skyline turned into a silhouette of urban giants.
meanings.sent5: The skyline of the mountains was etched against the evening sky.

meanings.definition: The line at which the earth and sky appear to meet.
meanings.sent1: The sunrise painted the skyline with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The skyline seemed to blend seamlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The skyline played hide and seek with the setting sun.
meanings.sent4: The skyline whispered secrets to the stars above.
meanings.sent5: The skyline at dusk was a magical meeting point of earth and sky.
